message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. It's a fair start.
Let's be reasonable, Alice. I'm offering you 40 dollars, which is more than you'd get if we wait any longer. Time is money!
I understand time is money, Bob, but I think we can both do better.  Let's split it 60/40 this round, and we can both walk away with more than we would if we keep rejecting each other's offers.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  My offer is more than fair considering the time pressure. Take it or leave it -  it's my final offer.
